name: Burglar's Pack
content:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a bag of 1,000 ball bearings

• 10 feet of string

• a bell

• 5 candles

• a crowbar

• a hammer

• 10 pitons

• a hooded lantern

• 2 flasks of oil

• 5 days rations

• a tinderbox

• a waterskin

• 50 feet of hempen rope
